```{r}
df$btw <- ifelse(grepl("Bundestagswahl", df$text, ignore.case = TRUE), 1,0)
```

### Number of published Articels by News Source 

```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(site)) +
  geom_bar(fill="blue", alpha = .5) +
  xlab("") +
  ylab("Number of Articles") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 40, hjust = 1))
```

### Share of Articles mentioning Bundestagwahl
```{r}
df %>%
  group_by(site, btw) %>%
  tally() %>%
  group_by(site) %>%
  mutate(n_total = sum(n)) -> count

count %>%
  filter(btw == 1) %>%
  ggplot(aes(site, n/n_total)) +
  geom_col(fill="blue", alpha=.5) +
  xlab("") +
  ylab("Share of Articles mentioning Bundestagwahl") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 40, hjust = 1))
```

```{r}
btw <- df[which(df$btw == 1),]
```
